tool_description: This API helps to query the best restaurant and meal around the world to create a traveling site/application such as thefork.com
name: The Fork The Spoon
title: The Fork The Spoon

api_list.name: restaurants/get-info (Deprecated)
api_list.description: Get all available information of specific restaurant

required_parameters.name: id_restaurant
required_parameters.description: The value of data/id field returned in …/restaurants/list endpoint

api_list.name: restaurants/auto-complete (Deprecated)
api_list.description: Get suggestion by term or phrase

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.description: City, district,country name, etc any word that you are familiar with

optional_parameters.name: latitude
optional_parameters.description: The end user's location, used for sorting purpose

optional_parameters.name: longitude
optional_parameters.description: The end user's location, used for sorting purpose

api_list.name: locations/auto-complete (Deprecated)
api_list.description: Get suggestion by term or phrase

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.description: City, district,country name, etc any word that you are familiar with

optional_parameters.name: latitude
optional_parameters.description: The end user's location, used for sorting purpose

optional_parameters.name: longitude
optional_parameters.description: The end user's location, used for sorting purpose

api_list.name: sale-type-menu/list (Deprecated)

required_parameters.name: id_restaurant
required_parameters.description: The value of data/id field returned in …/restaurants/v2/list endpoint

api_list.name: reviews/get-stat
api_list.description: Get review stat of specific restaurant

required_parameters.name: id_restaurant
required_parameters.description: The value of data/id field returned in …/restaurants/list endpoint

api_list.name: reviews/list
api_list.description: List reviews of specific restaurant by diners

required_parameters.name: id_restaurant
required_parameters.description: The value of data/id field returned in …/restaurants/v2/list endpoint

api_list.name: reviews/list-best
api_list.description: List all best reviews of specific restaurant by diners

required_parameters.name: id_restaurant
required_parameters.description: The value of data/id field returned in …/restaurants/v2/list endpoint

api_list.name: reviews/v2/list
api_list.description: List reviews of specific restaurant by diners

required_parameters.name: restaurantId
required_parameters.description: The value of data/id field returned in …/restaurants/v2/list endpoint

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: The offset of records to ignore for paging purpose.

optional_parameters.name: orderBy
optional_parameters.description: One of following is allowed RATING|MEAL_DATE

optional_parameters.name: sortDirection
optional_parameters.description: One of following is allowed ASC|DESC

api_list.name: food-report/list (Deprecated)
api_list.description: List all available food reported by other diners

required_parameters.name: id_restaurant
required_parameters.description: The value of data/id field returned in …/restaurants/v2/list endpoint

optional_parameters.name: count
optional_parameters.description: The number of items returned in each response

api_list.name: sale-type/list (Deprecated)
api_list.description: List all available sale type of specific restaurant

required_parameters.name: id_restaurant
required_parameters.description: The value of data/id field returned in …/restaurants/v2/list endpoint

api_list.name: restaurants/v2/list
api_list.description: List restaurants with options and filters

required_parameters.name: queryPlaceValueCityId
required_parameters.description: The value of id_city field returned in …/locations/v2/list endpoint

optional_parameters.name: queryPlaceValueCoordinatesLatitude
optional_parameters.description: The latitude of GEO location to look for around restaurants. Ex : 45.4642035

optional_parameters.name: filterRestaurantTagIdList
optional_parameters.description: Look for suitable value of meta/tagCategories/tags/id returend right in this endpoint, separated by comma for multiple value. Ex : 387,513

optional_parameters.name: filterSaleTypeTagIdList
optional_parameters.description: Look for suitable value of meta/filters/saleTypeTag/id returend right in this endpoint, separated by comma for multiple value. Ex : 1,3

optional_parameters.name: filterGroupedPromotion
optional_parameters.description: One of following is allowed 20|25|30|40|50, separated by comma for multiple value. Ex : 20,25,30

optional_parameters.name: queryPlaceValueCoordinatesLongitude
optional_parameters.description: The longitude of GEO location to look for around restaurants. Ex : 9.189982

api_list.name: locations/list (Deprecated)
api_list.description: List relating locations by Google place id

required_parameters.name: google_place_id
required_parameters.description: The value of data/geolocation/id/id fields returned in …/locations/auto-complete endpoint

api_list.name: locations/v2/list
api_list.description: List relating locations by Google place id

required_parameters.name: google_place_id
required_parameters.description: The value of data/geolocation/id/id fields returned in …/locations/auto-complete endpoint

optional_parameters.name: geo_text
optional_parameters.description: The value of 'text' fields returned in .../locations/v2/auto-complete endpoint
optional_parameters.default: Roma, Metropolitan City of Rome, Italy

optional_parameters.name: geo_type
optional_parameters.description: The value of 'type' fields returned in .../locations/v2/auto-complete

api_list.name: locations/v2/auto-complete
api_list.description: Get suggestion for locations by term or phrase

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.description: City, district,country name, etc any word that you are familiar with

optional_parameters.name: longitude
optional_parameters.description: The end user's location, used for sorting purpose

optional_parameters.name: latitude
optional_parameters.description: The end user's location, used for sorting purpose

api_list.name: restaurants/v2/get-info
api_list.description: Get all available information of specific restaurant

required_parameters.name: restaurantId
required_parameters.description: The value of data/id field returned in …/restaurants/v2/list endpoint

api_list.name: restaurants/list (Deprecated)
api_list.description: List restaurants with options and filters

required_parameters.name: queryPlaceValueCityId
required_parameters.description: The value of id_city field returned in …/locations/list endpoint

optional_parameters.name: filterSaleTypeTagIdList
optional_parameters.description: Look for suitable value of meta/filters/saleTypeTag/id returend right in this endpoint, separated by comma for multiple value. Ex : 1,3

optional_parameters.name: queryPlaceValueCoordinatesLatitude
optional_parameters.description: The latitude of GEO location to look for around restaurants. Ex : 45.4642035

optional_parameters.name: queryPlaceValueCoordinatesLongitude
optional_parameters.description: The longitude of GEO location to look for around restaurants. Ex : 9.189982

optional_parameters.name: filterRestaurantTagIdList
optional_parameters.description: Look for suitable value of meta/tagCategories/tags/id returend right in this endpoint, separated by comma for multiple value. Ex : 387,513

optional_parameters.name: filterGroupedPromotion
optional_parameters.description: One of following is allowed 20|25|30|40|50, separated by comma for multiple value. Ex : 20,25,30

api_list.name: restaurants/v2/auto-complete
api_list.description: Get suggestion for restaurants by term or phrase

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.description: City, district,country name, etc any word that you are familiar with
